ygData.subject: New RP Server???
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, apparently Verant is seriously contemplating giving in and creating an RP server.  A REAL RP server.  Changes in the playing rules and everything.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, apparently Verant is seriously contemplating giving in and creating an
RP server. A REAL RP server. Changes in the playing rules and everything. I
think that would be the one thing that could get me back in the game 100%.

I was also looking at the new Team server and wondering if anyone had tried
it. I like the idea of good/evil/neutral alliances (are they taking something
from AO here?) and wondered if it was more fun or added a new dimension to the
game that way.

Ice

____________________________________________________________________
